info.description: this application provides API for the NERDZ Social Networking Platform.
info.title: NERDZ API.
info.termsOfService: there are no TOS at this moment, use at your own risk we take no responsibility

ContactInfoTO.description: ContactInfoTO represents the TO of ContactInfo

InfoTO.description: InfoTO represents the TO of Info

PersonalInfoTO.description: PersonalInfoTO represents the TO of PersonalInfo

apiResponse.description: Response represents the response format of the API

humanMessage.description: The human generated message, easy to understand

success.description: Success indicates if the requested succeded

scopes.followers:read: Grants read access to user followers.
scopes.followers:write: Grants write access to user followers.
scopes.following:read: Grants read access to user following.
scopes.following:write: Grants write access to user following.
scopes.friends:read: Grants read access to user friends.
scopes.friends:write: Grants write access to user friends.
scopes.messages:read: Grants read access to messages in home, profiles and projects. Note that this scope includes profile_messages:read and project_messages:read.
scopes.messages:write: Grants write access to messages on profiles and projects. Note that this scope includes profile_messages:write and project_messages:write.
scopes.notifications:read: Grants read access to user notifications.
scopes.notifications:write: Grant write access to user notifications. This scope is necessary when the client needs to set as read a notification.
scopes.pms:read: Grants read access to user private messages.
scopes.pms:write: Grants write access to user private messages.
scopes.profile:read: Grants read access to profile info.
scopes.profile:write: Grants write access to profile info.
scopes.profile_comments:read: Grants read access to comments in profile posts.
scopes.profile_comments:write: Grants write access to comments in profile posts.
scopes.profile_messages:read: Grants read access to messages on profiles. Note that this scope includes profile_comments:read.
scopes.profile_messages:write: Grants write access to messages on profiles. Note that this scope includes profile_comments:write.
scopes.project_comments:read: Grants read access to comments in project posts.
scopes.project_comments:write: Grants write access to comments in project posts.
scopes.project_messages:read: Grants read access to messages on projects.
scopes.project_messages:write: Grants write access to messages on projects.
scopes.projects:read: Grants read access to projects info.
scopes.projects:write: Grants write access to projects info.
